text: Arrā koso wa, anata gata ni wa mieru hashira mo nakute, sho ten o kakage rareta katadearu. Sorekara kare wa,(taiken no) goza ni chinza nasa re, taiyō ya tsuki o shitagawa se rareru. (Dakara) onōno no sadame rareta jiki made unkō suru. Kare ga subete no jibutsu o kisei tōgyo shi, shuju no shirushi o kuwashiku nobe rareru. Kanarazu anata gata ni omo to no kaiken ni tsuite kakushin sa seru tamedearu
